parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The name of the class that corresponds to the UDF.

parameters.name: functionName
parameters.description: The name of the UDF. In most cases, the name of the UDF is the same as the class name. You can specify a name for the UDF.

parameters.name: udfArtifactName
parameters.description: The name of the JAR or Python file that corresponds to the UDF.
